Plus, they're pretty! Whereas, my other headphones are black and boring. Since my children are always using my other headphones I decided it was time to give another set a try. Title: I am very impressed with these headphones!

Comments: 12 people found this helpful. Was this review helpful to you?
Product: AILIHEN MS300 Headphones, Stereo Foldable Wired Headset for iPhone...
Reviews:
I really love these headphones. I have a giant head and it is quite tough to find headphones that fit over my head and don't pinch at the top but these are great. The inside top of the band is nicely padded for comfort and the padded ears make wearing them even for long periods quite comfortable. They adjust easily and fully cover the ear to block out surrounding sounds. The cord is sturdy and plenty long for most uses. The color is very pretty as well. The sound is nothing spectacular, but they're great for listening to audiobooks, videos, etc.

Overall, these are comfortable, attractive, and have good sound and I certainly recommend them.
Title: Comfortable, Attractive, Good Sound

The only negative is that they don't have a way to adjust the volume or pause/play the music! Otherwise, very nice headphone for the price!
Title: Good quality for the price!

Comments: Was this review helpful to you?
Product: AILIHEN MS300 Headphones, Stereo Foldable Wired Headset for iPhone...
Reviews:
We bought a pair similar to these several months ago. Same brand but slightly cheaper. My son is pretty hard on headphones and earbuds and we go through pairs pretty regularly so I wasn't willing to spend much on replacements. We have been very pleasantly surprised though and the Ailihen headphones have been super tough with plenty of quality So, we wanted to grab a back up set before we forgot what we had bought that worked. This time we went ahead and bought this mid price set.

I really would have loved the rose gold but since these are for my kiddo, he got to pick the color and of course choose green. It's a bright lime color but the metallic sheen makes it really pretty. The volume is very good and preset. Along with the ear pads that reduce any external noise, the volume is significant for a set of headphones. It is also very clear. We use these mostly for video games on the playstation, or youtube on a tablet. Both sounds and voices are extremely clear and easy to understand. The tension in the headband part and the padding on the earpads are very comfortable and allows the headphones to be worn for longer periods of time. The box says it has an inline microphone but I do not see it. Possibly it is built in in a way that I don't notice. These also fold up for easier storage than typical big, bulky headphones. We can easily put these in a small compartment of a backpack.

I'm thrilled to have two sets now and to have found a brand that seems kid proof. lol

Comments: Was this review helpful to you?
Product: AILIHEN MS300 Headphones, Stereo Foldable Wired Headset for iPhone...
Reviews:
I have headphones attached to my head for more than half the day, everyday. I listen to podcasts, music, videos, everything, while I do my artwork, while I clean, while I cook. I've used great many earbuds, and killed every one of them. These little 10 dollar troopers last me usually around 3-4 months, but I get sick of the little things in my ears. So I decided to treat myself to some decent overear headphones in a cute color.

Time till death: 1 week

These were delivered to my April 7 of 2018, and tonight, at 11:30 pm April 14, the weight of the wire falls in such a way at the connecting port that the audio sounds like it's underwater. The only time I've had a faster kill time were headphones that were unusable right out of the box.

The headphones are cute! The foldable aspect is very useful for taking them to school! They are comfortable!
But that wire isn't replaceable, and so do these headphones meet their death.

2 stars.
